autorole.use: Incorrect use model! Use `{{prefix}}autorole set`, `{{prefix}}autorole desativar or `{{prefix}}autorole status.`
autorole.channel: Hello, **{{user.username}}**. Please, mention the role if you want to use in Autorole. Remembering, mention just one.

tickets.description1:
Please, send the channel **ID** that will be used to create the ticket. There will be sent the message that when reacted, will create a ticket. 

 To cancel this operation, send `cancelar`.
tickets.description2: Please, send the category **ID** that will be created the ticket's.
tickets.description3: Please, send the name model the ticket that will be created. Use `variables` to replace informations with user id, user name, nickname and others... Example: `${name}'s_ticket
tickets.field: Show the {{field}} of the ticket owner
tickets.react: React bellow with {{emojiTicket}} to create your ticket.

entradas.msg:
Configure the welcome message! Send the message that you want to appear when someone join on your server! 
- If you want cancel, send `cancelar` 

 You can use this variables:
entradas.totaluservar: Show the full name of the joined user
entradas.dcUsers: Show the total number of discord members
entradas.continue: Ok! Now, the channel that the message will be send:

moderacao.comboDescription: Configure the channel and the message that will be send when someone be banned
moderacao.comboDescriptionMute: Configure the channel and the message that will be send when someone be muted
moderacao.privadoDescription: Configure the message that will be send in banned user's direct message
moderacao.description: Here you can confire my moderation commands! React with what you want configure!
moderacao.banMessage:
Configure the ban's message! Type it the message that you want that show when someone be banned from server! 
- If you want cancel, type it `cancelar` 

 Variables can be used:
moderacao.continue: Ok! Now mention the channel that message will be send:
moderacao.pv:
Configure the ban's message! Type the message that you want to show in user's DM when he's banned! 
- If you want to cancel, type `cancelar` 

 Variables can be used:
moderacao.mute-field: Configure the channel and the message that will be send when someone be muted
moderacao.embedDescription:
Configure the mute's message! Type the message that you want to show when someone is muted!
- If you want to cancel, type `cancelar` 

 Variables can be used:

cbanco.moeda: Type on chat the name of coins you want to be! The default name is `money`
